title: Kristan sual thawina a siam ta
lyrics:
Kristan sual thawina a siam ta,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!
Man pekin tlanin kan awm ta,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni.

Chhandamtu mak kha Isua a ni, Ka Lal Isua,
Chhandamtu mak kha Isua a ni, ka Lalpa.

Thisen thianghlim vangin ka fak,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!
Ka thla Pathian hnenah a hruai,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!

Ka thinlung sual hnu a tifel,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!
Chutichuan, Lalin ro a rel,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!

Ka kiangah kawng tluanin a kal,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni
Ni tinin thatnain min khal,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!

Isuan hneh theihna min pe leh,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!
Hmelma hnehtirin min chei leh,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!

A hnenah thinlung ka pe ang
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!
Khawvelin a chang ve lo vang,
Chhandamtu mak tak a ni!
